page.name: Online EIP Modules
page.content:
ACCESSING THE ON-LINE MODULES

  1. Open the Firefox browser. (This is the recommended browser.)
  2. Go to: http://www.csh.umn.edu/evidenceinformedpracticemodules/index.htm
  3. How to Start a Module
    1. To open a module, click on the blue link in the appropriate section, for example: Evidence Informed Practice.
    2. You will see the module summary screen. Click Start online module.
    3. Click the Start button.
  4. Click the arrow buttons at the bottom of the screen to go forward and back through the module screens. If you cannot view the buttons at the bottom of the screen:
    1. Use the scroll bars, if available OR
    2. Make the window larger OR
    3. Zoom Out
  5. If you want to go directly to a specific screen, type the number in the Go to page box and click the Go button.
  6. To exit, click Close at the top of the screen. You will still need to close the Moodle course.
  7. Unlimited quiz access is available. To access the quiz, click on QUIZ on the upper right hand of your â€¨screen while in the module. This will lead you into the first question of the quiz. At the end of the quiz there will be a summary of the questions you answered correctly.
